Orem.David O. McKay School of Education:
The David O. McKay School of Education, which was named after David O. McKay, operates one of the largest teacher preparation programs in the United States.
The school specializes in teaching, administration, communication disorders, and educational inquiry. The McKay School is located on the southwest end of Brigham Young University (BYU) in Provo, Utah, and is housed in the David O. McKay Building.
